Maddox

Height:
5'9" (174 cm)

Introduction

Maddox is a South Korean-British singer under KQ Produce a sub-label of KQ entertainment. He was introduced as a member of KQ Entertainment on November 20, 2018, and debuted on April 3, 2019 with the digital single 'But Maybe'. He's also apart of the production team Eden-ary witch has produced for groups like ATEEZ and Dreamcatcher.
